thread.section_title: Capo d'Africa Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Corporate team break
thread.title_full: Corporate team break - Review of Capo d'Africa Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Brettster2014
title: Corporate team break
text:
I organised a company team break in Rome staying at Hotel Capodafrica which represented the best solution for our group. Very nice clean and comfortable.
There were 13 colleagues in total and we booked the "Sala querceti" for the meeting room which was ideal.
" l'Attico " the restaurant we used for lunch was excellent. The weather was nice so lunch was served outside over looking the roof tops!
We also arranged an Ancient Rome walking tour and tour of the Vatican. Our guide was Luca Di Trapano & he was exceptional.
Extremely knowledge and charismatic - adding greatly to our experience.
